dishwasher|(n)|máy rửa chén|Ví dụ:|The dishwasher is a wonderful invention, I think.
dish drainer|(n)|rổ đựng chén bát|Ví dụ:|You need to buy a dish drainer for your kitchen.
steamer|(n)|chõ, nồi hấp, nồi đun hơi|Ví dụ:|She put some water in a steamer.
colander|(n)|cái chao (dụng cụ nhà bếp)|Ví dụ:|He bought a new colander.
lid|(n)|nắp, vung|Ví dụ:|I can't get the lid off this jar.
blender|(n)|máy xay sinh tố|Ví dụ:|He just needs the basic blender, with no add-ons.
pot|(n)|nồi, xoong|Ví dụ:|Please, give me the pot on the table.
toaster|(n)|máy/ lò nướng bánh mì|Ví dụ:|We used to have a toaster, but it broke.
dishtowel|(n)|khăn lau chén bát|Ví dụ:|I use the dishtowel to make dish dry.
refrigerator|(n)|tủ lạnh|Ví dụ:|Can you recommend a refrigerator?
freezer|(n)|tủ đông lạnh|Ví dụ:|There are some hamburgers in the freezer.
cabinet|(n)|tủ (có nhiều ngăn)|Ví dụ:|You should have a medicine cabinet.
microwave|(n)|lò vi ba|Ví dụ:|She reheated the soup in the microwave.
bowl|(n)|cái bát|Ví dụ:|She eats a bowl of soup every morning.
cutting board|(n)|cái thớt|Ví dụ:|He sliced them with a knife on a cutting board.
burner|(n)|bếp|Ví dụ:|You need to call someone else to check this burner.
stove|(n)|bếp lò|Ví dụ:|Will you light the stove?
coffee maker|(n)|máy pha cà phê|Ví dụ:|He turned on the coffee maker and opened the refrigerator door.
oven|(n)|lò|Ví dụ:|She popped the tart into the oven
oven cleaner|(n)|nước tẩy rửa lò|Ví dụ:|You forget to buy a new oven cleaner for me again.
jar|(n)|lọ, hũ|Ví dụ:|There is a jar of coffee in the drawer.
sink|(n)|bồn rửa bát, chậu rửa bát|Ví dụ:|She put all dirty dishes in the sink.
dish|(n)|đĩa đựng thức ăn|Ví dụ:|They used paper dishes at the party.
dish rack|(n)|khay để ráo chén đĩa|Ví dụ:|He put the wet dishes in the dish rack.
sponge|(n)|miếng xốp, bọt biển|Ví dụ:|You should wash the dishes with the sponge.
chopstick|(n)|Đũa ăn|Ví dụ:|Westerners find it really hard to eat with chopsticks.
pan|(n)|cái chảo|Ví dụ:|This pan isn't used anymore.
cooker|(n)|cái nồi|Ví dụ:|We always use electric cooker to cook rice.
mug|(n)|cái ca, vại, cốc lớn|Ví dụ:|I made myself a large mug of milk and went to bed.
kettle|(n)|ấm đun nước|Ví dụ:|The kettle is in kitchen.
glass|(n)|cái cốc, cái ly|Ví dụ:|She poured some milk into a glass.
teapot|(n)|bình trà, ấm pha trà|Ví dụ:|She dropped the teapot.
grill|(v)|nướng|Ví dụ:|Grill the sausages under a medium heat, turn occasionally.
tray|(n)|cái khay, cái mâm|Ví dụ:|She was carrying a tray of drinks.
whisk|(n)|cái đánh trứng, cái đánh kem|Ví dụ:|My family always use an electric whisk to make it fast.
knife|(n)|con dao|Ví dụ:|He uses a knife to cut the meat.
spoon|(n)|cái muỗng|Ví dụ:|I often use spoon to eat.
